title: 68: Hand Him a Hatchet
dc:creator: Canon Press
description:
Ready for the parenting advice you didn't know you needed? A #SASF mother of boys wrote in with a question about what to have her son read during a time when he had no friends. Nate and Brian launch off into a discussion of what books can do for you, along with what they can't, and what else to consider handing your son when he's struggling. What they ended up with is some great soul food for moms, particularly—although dads, there are some good points for you as well.

#StoriesAreSoulFood #NDWilson #BooksforBoys #Parenting
